data.name: Nox Terrorem: Lost Souls
data.detailed_description:
Immerse yourself in Nox Terrorem: Lost Souls. Play as Greg, searching for your missing friend and uncovering the truth behind a chilling mystery.

Shortly after requesting your help, your friend Alex vanishes. You enter the woods of Marrowbrooke, WA to try and find him. However, you are not alone in this place...

Nox Terrorem: Lost Souls is an atmospheric survival horror game which features:
  • 5+ hours of gameplay
  • A chilling story told through various documents
  • A horrifying Enemy who is relentless in its chase
  • 5 unique locations to explore
  • Haunting soundtrack written by composer Jake Menear
  • Cinematic effects and realistic visuals

Do you dare enter the forest?

data.short_description: A survival horror game where you must evade an ancient terror and solve a chilling mystery.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 480/NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Headphones recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 14 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX Vega 64/NVIDIA GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Play in a dark room for best experience

content_descriptors.notes: Occasional visual violence. Infrequent blood elsewhere.
